General.Name: Infield Minerals Corp
General.Description: Infield Minerals Corp. engages in the acquisition, exploration, and evaluation of mineral resource properties in Nevada and the United States. It explores for gold and silver deposits. The company holds 100% interest in the Desperado property with 172 mining claims covering an area of 1,410 hectares located in Nye County, Nevada. Infield Minerals Corp. was founded in 2020 and is headquartered in Vancouver, Canada.
General.Address: 609 Granville Street, Vancouver, BC, Canada, V7Y 1C3
